channel.title: Need immediate help with ip ban!
channel.description: Ok, I need help and fast. This guy keeps coming..I've had issues with my IP ban, but Now I really need it to work. Because right now its failing me =[. Someone can just try and log in, change their name, and come into my server if they're IP banned. I personally tried it.. 1) No they are [b] Not [/b] Using a proxy 2) I personally tried it.. 3) They are not hackers of any kind.

item.title: Need immediate help with ip ban!
item.dc:creator: @Patrickftw Patrickftw
item.description:
@Patrickftw wrote:

He has a point =s, So in some sources the IP ban works? I could just leech the method? =s

Read full topic

item.title: Need immediate help with ip ban!
item.dc:creator: @crackheadKD crackheadKD
item.description:
@crackheadKD wrote:

haha I was just jking… Anyways to ipban someone usually what I do is I find there file in the characters folder…
Once you open there file (usually named after there name) copy his ip and then go to data folder and open up ‘bannedips’ and paste it in there…
That worked for me everytime.

Read full topic
